name: Some Bees
description:
A game I started working on occasionally after work and on weekends  a while back because I thought it was funny that zombies sounded like some bees and I wanted to make something. Oh yeah, and I wanted to do a kurosawa/kill bill blood spray effect. That's pretty much the whole basis for this games existence.

Apologies for the dev art.

You play as a bee, at night zombie bees come to attack you. WASD moves around although you're constantly going forward as well. Mouse shoots if you have a gun.
